unnormalised: Regarding the patient's recent ECG, Dr. Sharma recommends a follow-up consultation at Apollo Hospital by 15/07/2024 to further evaluate the reported ST elevation and consider potential treatment options like medication or, if needed, a PTCA.
normalised: Regarding the patient's recent E-C-G, Doctor Sharma recommends a follow-up consultation at Apollo Hospital by fifteenth July two thousand and twenty four to further evaluate the reported S-T elevation and consider potential treatment options like medication or, if needed, a P-T-C-A.
